text: Signage was well done. It was a very professional experience, from design to installation. Very happy with outcome as we did not want a conventional pillar light and this satisfied our requirements to display the house number as well.

had a rush project and Sturdy Sign & Acrylic came to our rescue by meeting our tight deadline.

Beyond grateful for their assistance througout. The sign at our Customer Experience Centre is now a popular spot - our top management definitely loves the outcome of this project.

Thank you once again Sturdy Sign team!

My company engaged Sturdy Sign for a project to create custom acrylic mobile panel to install and display schools artwork. They were very fast in replying and answering the questions to meet our requirements. They are able to produce what we require with what best suites the school needs with affordable yet a good quality product. My company and school are very happy with the outcome and would definitely recommend it to others.

My company really enjoy our engagement with Sturdy Sign. We were completely lost at first on how to change our old signages and gotten real professional advice from them. They deliver on time and the work is perfect!

Eleanor is a great person and friendly. She always responded to my messages quickly and is always ready to help me with my signages.
There’s one time the signage was damaged and she handled perfectly and being very helpful too. Sturdy Sign has everything you needed for your company’s need.
